text: “Ambuye wathu! Ndithudi ife tamva kuitana kwa iye amene ali kuwaitana anthu kuti adze ku chipembedzo choonadi.” Iye adati: “Khulupirirani mwa Ambuye wanu ndipo ife takhulupirira. Ambuye wathu tikhululukireni ife machimo athu ndipo chotsani kwa ife ntchito zathu zoipa ndipo tipangeni kuti tife pamodzi ndi anthu olungama.”
